trends: There have been 10 other sightings in St Joseph
There were no other sightings in St Joseph on or around September 22nd 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were comming back from the zoo on hwy 71 kids were sleeping. We were about 10 min north of st. joe when 3 white orbs passed us overhead. They were moving super fast and indipendently of each other. when I turned to look at my husband Mark and I looked back on orb seemed to vanish. the other two keept moving at incredeble speeds towards the ssw. I couldnt tell if they fadded out or keeped going so fast they disapeard from sight. too low to be an airplane to siglent to be a helicopter(s) and just way too fast . you just know that what your seeing is not anything familiar. and was truly an amazing sight to behold. heather
Summary: 3 glowing white orb objects flew over us and disapeared while we were driving
